name: Best Residential Floors

market_entry_year_source.notes: Most efficient exterior floor slab insulation, updated to current year to avoid retroactive savings effects.

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on 4 ft R20 Exterior XPS; does not apply to southern climate zones, where heat loss through the ground is a net positive

installed_cost_source.notes: Based on 4 ft R20 Exterior XPS (3.2 $/ft^2 slab exterior area converted to 1.74 $/ft^2 footprint using the ratio 0.545 ft^2 slab exterior/ft^2 footprint calculated using the average of the single-family and multifamily prototype building ratios based on their perimeter and footprint values (SF: 140 ft perimeter, 1200 ft^2 footprint; MF: 1214 ft perimeter, 7794.39 ft^2 footprint) with a 4 ft insulation depth + baseline cost of $5.03/ft^2 footprint (https://github.com/trynthink/scout/blob/master/cpl_envelope_mels.json, assumes uninsulated slab); added perimeter slab insulation does not apply to southern climate zones

source_data.title: Scout Baseline Envelope Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Data (cpl_envelope_mels.json)
source_data.author: Jared Langevin

source_data.title: National Energy and Cost Savings for New Single- and Multifamily Homes: A Comparison of the 2006, 2009, and 2012 Editions of the IECC

product_lifetime_source.notes: Assumed to be the same as the lifetime of the home

_description: Most efficient exterior floor slab insulation in 2018
